title.narrative: Actions to support and protect Children and Youth in Street Situation from COVID-19

description.narrative: This project aims at facing the impact of the COVID-19 on the Children and Youth in Street Situation (CYSS) and care structures in Egypt. The specific objective is to support and protect children and youth in street situation from COVID-19 as well as the staff of the entities serving them. At least 1000 beneficiaries get awareness sessions and hygiene kits. At least 200 professionals have training sessions and protection materials.
